extension.name: NuSOAP - SOAP Toolkit for PHP
extension.author: Conflate (created the package)
extension.license: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
extension.description: NuSOAP is a rewrite of SOAPx4, provided by NuSphere and Dietrich Ayala. It is a set of PHP classes - no PHP extensions required - that allow developers to create and consume web services based on SOAP 1.1, WSDL 1.1 and HTTP 1.0/1.1.
